Tom is one of those rare finds! He believes in serving his clients with the upmost of dedication. Tom is very detail oriented mainly from years in the service and working for the FAA. I don't believe you'll find anyone who is as good at managing all the details of a real estate transaction. I know first hand how frustrating it can be working with an agent who isn't as dedicated to their profession as Tom! Bringing a Real Estate transaction to a successful  close can be either extremely frustrating or an enjoyable stress free event. Tom works extremely hard to deliver the latter .Whether your buying or selling you can feel confident that Tom will have even the most minute of details well in hand! Call Him Today Chris Esparza
